title: RumPerfMetric
description: Schema of properties for a technical performance metric

min.description: The minimum value seen for this metric during the view's lifetime.

max.description: The maximum value seen for this metric during the view's lifetime.

average.description: The average value for this metric during the view's lifetime.

metric_max.description: The maximum possible value we could see for this metric, if such a max is relevant and can vary from session to session.
